name: covalent
content:

involving two atoms sharing one or more pairs of electrons that hold them together: The covalent binding of drugs to receptors results in stable long-lasting complexes. In covalent solids, such as carbon and silicon, covalent bonds form between neighbouring atoms by electron sharing. This provides evidence that the bonding in aluminium oxide is not purely ionic nor is it purely covalent. See also
